video.title: Twitch Plays(Viewers play/Chat plays)Final Fantasy 6 on an actual Wii day 02 hour 00 to hour 12 type !help to learn how to play (Part 4)

message.body: We have a Discord server and there is currently a poll up for which game to be played after this (Date TBD), the options are: The Legend of Zelda (NES), Zelda 2 The Adventure of Link (NES) and Kingdom Hearts 2 Re-Revisit (So you can finish whatever there is left to do and beat the game), you can vote for more than one option, Discord server link here: https://discord.gg/yHETNuZCUK
